title: Why you might be afraid to spend your stimulus check - Financial Post
description: NEW YORK — If you got your stimulus payment this week from the IRS and it is still in your account, are you afraid to spend it?Many recipients immediately deployed the money they received as …
content:
NEW YORK — If you got your stimulus payment this week from the IRS and it is still in your account, are you afraid to spend it?
Many recipients immediately deployed the money they received as part of the CARES Act – up to $1,200 per adult and $500 per child … [+3362 chars]
